data.text:
ðŸŽƒ Happy Halloween! ðŸŽƒ Did you know that McDonald's advertisements are known for their playful and creative approach, especially during Halloween? One example is the McDonald's Finland campaign in 2019, where they added adorable faces to their logos and products, creating a memorable experience for their customers. McDonald's knows how to captivate its customers with creative advertising techniques better than anyone else. Whether it's the iconic McBoo or the fang-tastic Vampire Fries, McDonald's Halloween treats will make your taste buds scream with joy. Also, have you seen their sauce packaging in Australia? It appears that McDonald's knows how to infuse a spooky twist into every aspect of their branding. #happyhalloween #branding #packaging #creative #innovation #advertisingcampaign #mcdonalds

Ever wondered what your view looks like in an Xperience? We've got our amazing talent front and center AND a close up of what they are doing in the kitchen so that you can easily follow along. Also, how good do these pretzels look? Keep an eye out for a special TWIST on our pretzel Xperience for Oktoberfest coming soon. ðŸ‘€ #TeamBuilding #ClientEngagement #CustomerEngagement #CookingClass
